name: SSSR Ninja
description:
Name:SSSR Ninja

Group Members: Jiaqi Yao, Rumei Mai, Xiangyue Meng, Yuting Cui

Jiaqi Yao: Building Fishing Game, Running game, Inventory System 

Rumei Mai: Dancing Line Camera Following and Path Position, Music Editing, Merging Scenes, Graphic Coloring, Win conditions for Fishing, Running, and Firing Game

Xiangyue Meng: Click Fire Game, time and count system in Fishing Game, Time countdown system, Energy System, UI elements

Yuting Cui: Graphic Design, UI Design, Scene Connection, Scene Transition, Background Music Inputting, Raining Game, Fruit Scliping Game, Dancing Line Character Movement and background Animation

Sound Effects: http://www.aigei.com/sound/
